about.title: The Spirit of the Alebrije
about.subtitle: Where Mexican heritage meets modern comfort
about.description: Casa Alebrije is a sanctuary where the rich heritage of the Zapotecs of Oaxaca intertwines with the boundless imagination of the alebrijes. Inspired by the ancient civilization of Monte Albán, our hotel revives the belief in tonas and nahuales—spiritual animals that, according to the Zapotecs, protect and guide each person from birth.
